formatted_address: 6 Napier Rd, #03-07 Gleneagles Medical Centre, Singapore 258499
name: Singapore Knee Sports and Orthopaedic Clinic

reviews.text: Bad admin treatment. Documents I asked for is not given. Ignored documents and queries related messages. Doctor was OK, but it gives the obvious. I have better understanding learning up from Google. Overcharge too. Have to make a hassle to another clinic to do MRI scan.

Dr Mohan, first class treatment üëçüèª
Did my clavicle surgery with Dr Mohan.
The nurses are also very kind and assist us a lot in a lot of stuffs.

Thank you very much!

Went to clinic to seek help wth a very painful left knee n leg.  Met wth Dr Tan Chin Yit n found him to be extremely patient, kind and competent.  He took time to listen to my problem, examined my knee n back carefully, then gave very clear explanation of the cause of my pain plus the best way to treat it. He was very gentle and caring n made me feel confident of his expertise.  I would highly recommend him to anyone suffering from similar problem.  Thk you so much Dr Tan. God bless you. üôè
I went to see Dr. Ambrose Yung few weeks ago, he is a very good doctor. He explains the condition very thoroughly. The treatment that he did was also very effective. Strongly recommended.
All doctors and nurses are very kind and helpful.
